TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed ADODC/BOFActionEnum extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: Provides constants for compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 property.

span.span: Provides constants for compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Dans Visual Basic 6.0, le `BOFAction` propriété a été utilisée pour déterminer quelle action le `ADODC` prend lorsque la `BOF` propriété a la valeur true.In Visual Basic 6.0, the `BOFAction` property was used to determine what action the `ADODC` takes when the `BOF` property is true. Ces constantes activent le code qui a été mis à niveau à partir de Visual Basic 6.0 pour continuer à s’exécuter sans modification supplémentaire.These constants enable code that has been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to run without additional modification. > [!NOTE] > Les fonctions et objets de l’espace de noms sont fournis pour être utilisés par les outils de mise à niveau de Visual Basic 6.0 vers Visual Basic.Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. Dans la plupart des cas, ces fonctions et objets dupliquent les fonctionnalités que vous pouvez trouver dans d’autres espaces de noms dans le [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. Ils sont nécessaires uniquement lorsque le modèle de code Visual Basic 6.0 diffère considérablement de la [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implémentation.They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC/BOFActionEnum adDoMoveFirst = int32(0)

summary.span: Keeps the first record as the current record.

span.span: Keeps the first record as the current record.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC/BOFActionEnum adStayBOF = int32(1)

summary.span: Moving past the start of a triggers the event on the first record, followed by a Reposition event on the invalid (BOF) record.

span.span: Moving past the start of a triggers the event on the first record, followed by a Reposition event on the invalid (BOF) record.

summary.span: At this point, the **Move Previous** button on the is disabled.

span.span: At this point, the **Move Previous** button on the is disabled.
